main.name: Shower Caddy
main.description: A shower caddy is important for community style dorms. You will need it to bring all your shower supplied to and from the bathroom.

main.name: Mattress Topper
main.description: The mattresses provided by universities are usually very stiff, so you will need a mattress topper for comfort.

main.name: Bath Robe
main.description: You will need a bath robe to walk to and from the bathroom, especially if you live in a dorm with community bathrooms

main.name: Shower Shoes
main.description: Shower shoes are an absolute must if you are sharing the shower with multiple different people!

main.name: Extra Storage
main.description: Dorm rooms are very small, so you will most likely need extra storage to optimize the space. It's common for students to get extra storage to put under their bed.
